A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This felt like someone pitched a bunch of really cool scenes regardless of whether they matched previous cannon\, previously established characters\, the previous movie\, or even this very same movie. 

It's a disjointed\, incoherent story and it's a crying shame that the creators can't respect that while visual oos and ahhs drives up the box office the heart and soul of star wars has always been the story.  

To call the scenes duct taped together is a disservice to the wonders of our shiny grey friend.
